lines.text: I have nothing, you have plenty. Swell! Okay by me!
Oh, I see. You have no objection to marrying a rich woman?
I wouldn't mind that; I'd adore it.
Oh... you mean to say, you'd be quite content to be supported by a woman?
Oh, she wouldn't be supporting me. We'd split.
Oh no he's not. Just a bit obvious. Knows what he wants and gets it. He's got a terrific reputation as a lover.
How do people get reputations as lovers? Women tell their friends?
No, not exactly. But it gets about. If you see a lot of women looking particularly radiant - somebody's been around.
Just my luck! I've been out for ten years, and I've never been so much as hinted at!
